text: District Collector V. Dakshinamoorthy has said that efforts are on to rescue and rehabilitate missing children through Operation Smile-II drive. The drive would be held till January 31. Teams formed for the purpose will conduct searches in temples, railway stations, and tourist places to locate missing children. If the members of public come across such children, they can contact 04286-233103 or 72000-10258.
title: Operation Smile –II
